snippet: Michael Moore explains how the voting process will work under revised rules for the best documentary feature Oscar.
abstract: Michael Moore explains how the voting process will work under revised rules for the best documentary feature Oscar.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - Once the cat was out of the bag, and it became clear that the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences was about to announce changes in its rules for the feature documentary Oscar, Michael Moore, a member of the Academy's governing board, called to explain the full extent of the revisions. And extensive, they truly are.

headline.main: Michael Moore on How the New Documentary Rules Will Work

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
